title: Death & Mortality
subtitle: Living fully by facing the end
description: Death awareness is a powerful teacher that most of us avoid. This course helps you face mortality consciously—not morbidly, but as a way to clarify what matters, release what doesn't, and live with more presence and purpose.

modules.title: Your Relationship with Death
modules.description: How you've learned to relate to mortality

modules.title: Death as Advisor
modules.description: Using mortality to clarify what matters

modules.title: Legacy and Meaning
modules.description: What do you want to leave behind?

whatYouLearn: Understand how death awareness can transform life
Use death as an advisor for choices
Clarify what legacy and meaning you want to create
Integrate mortality awareness into daily living
requirements: Not currently in acute grief (take Grief course instead)

questions.question: How can death awareness improve life?
options: It clarifies priorities, releases petty concerns, and creates urgency for what matters

questions.question: What is death anxiety?
options: The terror or denial we experience when confronting our mortality

questions.question: What does 'death as advisor' mean?
options: Using the reality of death to evaluate choices and priorities

questions.question: How does avoiding death affect life?
options: Can lead to living inauthentically, postponing what matters, and numbing

questions.question: What is 'legacy' in this context?
options: What you contribute, create, and leave behind—relationships, values, impact

questions.question: How can death awareness be integrated into daily life?
options: Regular contemplation that informs priorities without becoming obsession
Only thinking about it when old
